title: Craig Wright's Counsel Hits Back at COPA's Fraud Allegations in Closing Argument
description: Anthony Grabiner, Wright's attorney, hit back at COPA's argument that private signing sessions Wright hosted to prove he was the Bitcoin founder had been subverted, saying that no proof had been presented.

title: Ronin Hits All-Time High Price as Ethereum Gaming Network Hosts Free ‘Kaidro’ NFT Mint

title: CCP reveals game world details and playtest dates for new blockchain game set in EVE universe
description:
Project Awakening will take place on a single shard set in the same universe as EVE Online.

CCP Games, developer and publisher of EVE Online, has finally released new information about the highly anticipated upcoming blockchain game “Project Awakening.”

According to a pair of March 13 posts on the game’s official website, the next Project Awakening playtest/hackathon will take place on May 21. Signups for the closed beta are currently live as of the time of this article’s publication.

The posts also gave us our first glimpse at details surrounding the game world and its lore. Per CCP Project Awakening will be a single-shard survival experience — meaning gamers won’t be split across instances. It’s set in “the dark expanse of space where civilization has decayed in the ruin of its own ambition.” Gameplay will purportedly revolve around survival, rebuilding a “broken world,” and combat.

Read more

title: US court tightens grip on Changpeng Zhao with travel and passport restrictions
description:
Changpeng Zhao, co-founder and former CEO of Binance, has been instructed by US authorities to surrender his Canadian passport before sentencing in April. The directive forms part of a series of restrictions imposed on his bond terms by Judge Richard A Jones on March 11. New restrictions Judge Jones ruled that Zhao must stay within […]
